name: RPG Crystareino
description:
Suddenly summoned to a mysterious world, what will the hero protect and lose?
Your adventure starts now.

**In this app, you can try a part of the story for free. You will need to unlock the full version by purchasing it at a special price of $3.99 (Standard Price: $7.99) within game to play in its entirety.**

Master 20 different classes!

Create the ultimate character with a wide variety of classes!
As the story progresses, the protagonist and his friends will be able to switch to different classes.
As classes are mastered, special skills are learned and advanced classes become available.
Create your own ultimate character.

Use the hero's special skill Brave Burst!

Different classes will teach you different skills.
Fill up the gauge and... Brave Burst!
Make full use of diverse abilities, and defeat the enemies in your way.

In search of friends around the world...
You will become friends with more characters as the story progresses.
Sometimes characters who are not main characters will join you if you talk to them.

* You will need to unlock the full game to experience every feature of the game in its entirety.
* The actual price might differ depending on the region.

[Supported OS]
- 2.2 and up
[SD Card Storage]
- Enabled
[Languages]
- English, Japanese

[IMPORTANT NOTICE]
